body_html: This is as expected. Since they are different devices with different implementations, they are going to be slightly different. Any robust machine learning applications needs to be robust enough to handle this. If not, there is no hope that perturbations of training data will work at all.

body: This is as expected. Since they are different devices with different implementations, they are going to be slightly different. Any robust machine learning applications needs to be robust enough to handle this. If not, there is no hope that perturbations of training data will work at all.
